name: Go Series: Defense Wars
description: Defend your base from attack until the reinforcements arrive! Take control of a mini arsenal of weapons and fight off wave after wave of enemy attack. Hold your base until the reinforcements arrive by flicking bullets and bombs at the oncoming enemies using the stylus. Arm your base with guns, cannons and tanks in preparation for the onslaught and then attack with everything you’ve got. Your mission is to survive... Good luck!
